Things to do in Tokyo

Embark on a thrilling journey through Tokyo's dynamic attractions! Experience the enchanting magic of Tokyo Disney Resort, a whimsical realm for families and thrill-seekers, or delve into cinematic wonders at Warner Bros. Studio Tour Tokyo. Ascend Shibuya Sky for breathtaking panoramic city vistas. These captivating destinations promise unforgettable adventures in Japan's vibrant capital.

Things to do in Tokyo

Embark on a thrilling journey through Tokyo's dynamic attractions! Experience the enchanting magic of Tokyo Disney Resort, a whimsical realm for families and thrill-seekers, or delve into cinematic wonders at Warner Bros. Studio Tour Tokyo. Things to do in Tokyo

Reviews of Tokyo activities

KimHong ***
2025-12-23 07:57:04
Fantastic 5.0
The view was stunning! And booking thru Klook was fast and easy. Pls be punctual and they will allow you to go in 5-10 mins before your scheduled admission. The lift to the admission level was always crowded too. I had booked 345pm slot so that I could view sunset. You can stay as long as you like as the staff never asked us to leave.

SHIBUYA SKY Ticket

Yuen ****************
2025-12-27 13:45:30
Fantastic 5.0
Booking Convenience with Klook: Klook is convenient to purchase from, and you can use the QR code on your phone for entry. However, when using the Disney Apps, because you need to scan the QR code, you must print a physical copy or take a photo of it on another phone. Queue Times: It was Christmas Day, so there were a lot of people. Basically, you have to queue for two hours for anything slightly fun, so it is highly recommended to quickly buy DPA (Disney Premier Access) as they will gradually sell out. The Elsa one was already sold out the moment you entered the park. Shows: It rained continuously that night, and the most important show of the evening was canceled, which was a great pity, but there were still fireworks. Facilities: Good

Remember to go back the rooms you visited because the effects is changing. Actually mostly it takes approximate 2hours to get to visit all rooms and seen like 80% of effects.

Tokyo Chiikawa Park Ticket

FAQs about Tokyo

What are the top things to do in Tokyo?

Here are the most popular things to do in Tokyo:

  1. Tokyo Disney Resort - Tokyo Disneyland & Tokyo DisneySea Park Tickets - Visitors consistently praise Tokyo Disney Resort for its magical atmosphere, unique theming, and spectacular shows, all enhanced by a convenient booking and seamless entry process.
  2. SHIBUYA SKY Ticket - Guests are consistently wowed by SHIBUYA SKY's stunning 360-degree panoramic city views from its spacious open-air rooftop, along with its smooth entry process.
  3. teamLab Borderless Ticket: MORI Building DIGITAL ART MUSEUM - Visitors rave about teamLab Borderless, calling it a visually stunning and highly interactive digital art experience with immersive rooms that create a fun, memorable, and unique sensory journey.

What are the best activities or sights for families in Tokyo?

For families visiting Tokyo, consider these top activities and sights:

  1. Senkyaku Banrai Toyosu Manyo Club Onsen Experience in Tokyo - For families seeking relaxation, the Senkyaku Banrai Toyosu Manyo Club Onsen offers a highly relaxing and refreshing experience, perfect for unwinding and finding peace after exploring.
  2. Tokyo Asakusa Kimono&Yukata Rental at Kimono Miyabi Asakusa Station - Families can enjoy a highly satisfying and enjoyable cultural experience by renting beautiful kimonos with professional service at Kimono Miyabi Asakusa Station, creating memorable moments.
  3. Kimono rental & photography experience in Asakusa - A kimono rental and photography experience in Asakusa is a highly enjoyable and memorable activity for families, praised for its efficiency and fun.
